channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Minnesota Extends Bowl Game Win Streak to 9 After Beating New Mexico
item.description: The Minnesota Golden Gophers extended their win streak in bowl games to nine after beating New Mexico in the Rate Bowl on Friday.

item.title: Northwestern Beats Central Michigan in GameAbove Sports Bowl
item.description: Preston Stone threw three touchdown passes and Northwestern turned four turnovers into touchdowns to beat Central Michigan 34-7 in the GameAbove Sport...

item.title: Michigan Announces Hiring of Utah Legend Kyle Whittingham As New Head Coach
item.description: The Michigan Wolverines have reportedly found their next head coach and replacement for Sherrone Moore in Kyle Whittingham.

item.title: A reason (or two) to watch every one of this year's bowl games
item.description: With first-year success stories, chances at redemption and general silliness, bowl season always delivers.

item.title: What you need to know for every NFL game in Week 17 -- including fantasy tips, playoff implications, predictions
item.description: Seahawks vs. Panthers. Jalen Hurts vs. Josh Allen. Picks, predictions and more for every remaining Week 17 game.

item.title: Buzz: What we're hearing on Burrow, the red-hot Jaguars and Pro Bowl rosters
item.description: Here's the latest intel from around the league, including whether Joe Burrow wants out of Cincy and more.

item.title: Transfer window preview: What do Europe's big clubs need?
item.description: The window opens across Europe in January, so what are the top teams planning?

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United consider re-signing former midfielder Garner
item.description: Former Manchester United midfielder James Garner is being targeted for a return to Old Trafford. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: Jay Glazer: Maxx Crosby Left Raiders Facility After They Wanted to Shut Him Down
item.description: DE Maxx Crosby left the Raiders' facility after disagreeing with the team's plan to shut him down, per FOX Sports' Jay Glazer.

item.title: Hammer Jaguars, Steelers and Bills as favorites in Nick Wright's Week 17 Picks | First Things First
item.description: Nick Wright unveils his Week 17 picks off an undefeated Week 16, including the Jacksonville Jaguars, Pittsburgh Steelers and Buffalo Bills picking up ...
